commandDescriptions.play: Starts playing Cadence in your voice channel
commandDescriptions.stop: Stops playing Cadence and leaves your voice channel (so you can play it in another)
commandDescriptions.nowplaying: Displays now playing information from Cadence
commandDescriptions.search: Search the Cadence database using the remainder of the given message as a query.
commandDescriptions.request: Request a song to be played on Cadence. You may request one song every five minutes (limited by Cadence)

startsWith.Cadence please don't: You won't be able to tell, but in a moment I won't even try to %s.
startsWith.Cadence please: You won't be able to tell, but in a moment I'll begin to %s.
